item.title: Bangalore to Horanadu Solo Trip Plan
item.description: A solo trip from Bangalore to Horanadu is one of the most peaceful and rewarding getaways you can experience in Karnataka. Whether you are riding alone on a motorcycle or travelling with family in a car, this route gives you a perfect mix of spirituality, Western Ghats beauty, and calm mountain roads. The main highlight of this journey is visiting the famous Horanadu Sri Annapoorneshwari Temple, o
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
